localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Share content and connect to people you love on Hive. You can express yourself with our customizable Music Section. There's featured content, trending hashtags, and a list of topics on our Explore page. You can even Repost, share, and reply to posts with Gifs.
blogPost.body: Share content and connect to people you love on Hive. You can express yourself with our customizable Music Section. There's featured content, trending hashtags, and a list of topics on our Explore page. You can even Repost, share, and reply to posts with Gifs.
blogPost.title: Hive Social - Instagram's replacement
blogPost.author: Gabe Perez

localize.description: 在Hive上分享内容并与您所爱的人建立联系。你可以通过我们可定制的音乐版块表达自己的想法。我们的探索页面上有特色内容、热门标签和主题列表。你甚至可以转发、分享和回复带有 Gifs 的帖子。
在Hive上分享內容並與您所愛的人建立聯繫。你可以通過我們可定製的音樂版塊表達自己的想法。我們的探索頁面上有特色內容、熱門標籤和主題列表。你甚至可以轉發、分享和回覆帶有 Gifs 的帖子。

previous.excerpt: With UpCount.live you can get your product upvotes counter online. Monitor your Product Hunt launch upvotes count on a big screen or mobile device.
previous.title: UpCount.live - Watch your Product Hunt launch 🔔

localize.description: 有了UpCount.live，你可以在线获取你的产品上票数。在大屏幕或移动设备上监控您的产品搜索发布的上票数。
localize.tagline: 观看您的猎奇产品发布会 🔔。

localize.description: 有了UpCount.live，你可以在線獲取你的產品上票數。在大屏幕或移動設備上監控您的產品搜索發佈的上票數。
localize.tagline: 觀看您的獵奇產品發佈會 🔔。

next.excerpt: Mirror your iPhone and iPad screen on a web browser with Replica and bring your favorite iOS apps to Mac, Windows or Linux. To celebrate this launch, the screen mirror to a web browser will be free for a limited period of time!
next.title: Replica 3.0 - Mirror your iOS screen on a modern web browser

localize.description: 使用 Replica 将您的 iPhone 和 iPad 屏幕镜像到网络浏览器上，并将您最喜爱的 iOS 应用程序带到 Mac、Windows 或 Linux 上。为庆祝此次发布，屏幕镜像到网络浏览器将在有限的时间内免费。
localize.tagline: 在现代网络浏览器上镜像你的iOS屏幕

localize.description: 使用 Replica 將您的 iPhone 和 iPad 屏幕鏡像到網絡瀏覽器上，並將您最喜愛的 iOS 應用程序帶到 Mac、Windows 或 Linux 上。爲慶祝此次發佈，屏幕鏡像到網絡瀏覽器將在有限的時間內免費。
localize.tagline: 在現代網絡瀏覽器上鏡像你的iOS屏幕
